Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

What is lemlist used for ?

![Image 386](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

lemlist is the most advanced sales engagement platform and the top choice for customer generation. As an all-in-one outreach solution, lemlist allows you to:

→ Find buyer-ready prospects and their contact details with minimal effort directly on the platform, using the most accurate and up-to-date database of 450 million leads

→ Discover valid email addresses for your LinkedIn leads directly within lemlist - no need for third-party tools.

→ Generate highly personalized multichannel campaigns using the most advanced AI on the market, trained by successful campaigns from over 400 million emails sent by top outreach experts.

→ Create multichannel campaigns with advanced conditions to engage leads on their preferred channel at the optimal time, resulting in higher conversions.

→ Personalize emails at scale by incorporating custom intro lines, images, dynamic landing pages, liquid syntax, and more.

→ Avoid the risk of ending up in spam folders by using the most advanced warm-up and deliverability booster available on the market (for free)

Founded in 2018, lemlist has been revolutionizing prospecting as a leader in personalized outreach, deliverability, multi-channel prospecting, and enabling users to find their leads within the platform directly.

Over 37,284 users have put their prospecting on autopilot mode and generate millions in revenue monthly with lemlist.

Can I get a demo of lemlist ?

![Image 387](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

Yes! We currently conduct LIVE group demos to guide you through lemlist and address all your questions. You can view the upcoming sessions and register by [clicking here](https://calendly.com/lemlist/intro-demo?r=0).

What can I try during the lemlist’s 14-day free trial ?

![Image 388](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

The 14-day free trial provides you access to most of the features lemlist offers, enabling you to explore the product without any limitations.You'll have the capability to:

→ Discover 100 buyer-ready prospects for free

→ Free credits that transfer to free verified emails, phone numbers, or calling minutes.

→ Create and launch multi-channel personalized campaigns with all available steps (email, LinkedIn, in-app call, API, etc.)

→ Access detailed campaign reports

→ Use the task section and all other features that lemlist offers.

Can I sync. lemlist with my CRM ?

![Image 389](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

Yes! You can natively integrate your HubSpot, SalesForce and Pipedrive CRM. You can push all activities from your campaigns (e.g. new lead, email sent, email opened, etc.) as well as send leads from your CRM to lemlist campaigns.

You can use tools like Zapier, or Pabbly to connect your CRM to lemlist.

Can I get help with my technical setup ?

![Image 390](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

Yes! We have step-by-step guides accessible here and in lemlist when you start the onboarding process. You can also book a meeting with our customer success team to help you set it up.

Please contact them using the chat bubble from your lemlist account or via [support@lemlist.com](mailto:support@lemlist.com?r=0)

How can I avoid landing in spam ?

![Image 391](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

You can use lemwarm, the most advanced warm-up and deliverability booster on the market, designed to help you send emails without them ending up in the spam folder.

lemwarm is included at no additional cost with the following plans: Email Pro, Multichannel Expert, and Outreach Scale.

We recommend using lemwarm before, during, and after sending your campaign to eliminate all spam risks. The tool operates 100% on autopilot, so once you've set up your account, lemwarm will handle the task for you.

Have a question ?

![Image 392](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

You can reach our support team anytime from your lemlist account using the chat bubble or via email at [support@lemlist.com](mailto:support@lemlist.com?r=0). You can also connect with us through the chat bubble on the website.

Please note that if you are not logged into on your account, we will have limited information to assist you.

Advanced personalization, outreach automation, auto email warm-up... Get ready for a cold email outreach tool that makes your life easy.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

What is lemlist used for ?

![Image 387](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

lemlist is the most advanced sales engagement platform and the top choice for customer generation. As an all-in-one outreach solution, lemlist allows you to:

→ Find buyer-ready prospects and their contact details with minimal effort directly on the platform, using the most accurate and up-to-date database of 450 million leads

→ Discover valid email addresses for your LinkedIn leads directly within lemlist - no need for third-party tools.

→ Generate highly personalized multichannel campaigns using the most advanced AI on the market, trained by successful campaigns from over 400 million emails sent by top outreach experts.

→ Create multichannel campaigns with advanced conditions to engage leads on their preferred channel at the optimal time, resulting in higher conversions.

→ Personalize emails at scale by incorporating custom intro lines, images, dynamic landing pages, liquid syntax, and more.

→ Avoid the risk of ending up in spam folders by using the most advanced warm-up and deliverability booster available on the market (for free)

Founded in 2018, lemlist has been revolutionizing prospecting as a leader in personalized outreach, deliverability, multi-channel prospecting, and enabling users to find their leads within the platform directly.

Over 37,284 users have put their prospecting on autopilot mode and generate millions in revenue monthly with lemlist.

Can I get a demo of lemlist ?

![Image 388](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

Yes! We currently conduct LIVE group demos to guide you through lemlist and address all your questions. You can view the upcoming sessions and register by [clicking here](https://calendly.com/lemlist/intro-demo).

What can I try during the lemlist’s 14-day free trial ?

![Image 389](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

The 14-day free trial provides you access to most of the features lemlist offers, enabling you to explore the product without any limitations.You'll have the capability to:

→ Discover 100 buyer-ready prospects for free

→ Free credits that transfer to free verified emails, phone numbers, or calling minutes.

→ Create and launch multi-channel personalized campaigns with all available steps (email, LinkedIn, in-app call, API, etc.)

→ Access detailed campaign reports

→ Use the task section and all other features that lemlist offers.

Can I sync. lemlist with my CRM ?

![Image 390](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

Yes! You can natively integrate your HubSpot, SalesForce and Pipedrive CRM. You can push all activities from your campaigns (e.g. new lead, email sent, email opened, etc.) as well as send leads from your CRM to lemlist campaigns.

You can use tools like Zapier, or Pabbly to connect your CRM to lemlist.

Can I get help with my technical setup ?

![Image 391](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

Yes! We have step-by-step guides accessible here and in lemlist when you start the onboarding process. You can also book a meeting with our customer success team to help you set it up.

Please contact them using the chat bubble from your lemlist account or via [\[email protected\]](https://www.lemlist.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#b9caccc9c9d6cbcdf9d5dcd4d5d0cacd97dad6d4)

How can I avoid landing in spam ?

![Image 392](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

You can use lemwarm, the most advanced warm-up and deliverability booster on the market, designed to help you send emails without them ending up in the spam folder.

lemwarm is included at no additional cost with the following plans: Email Pro, Multichannel Expert, and Outreach Scale.

We recommend using lemwarm before, during, and after sending your campaign to eliminate all spam risks. The tool operates 100% on autopilot, so once you've set up your account, lemwarm will handle the task for you.

Have a question ?

![Image 393](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de921a1902d8d8b7a99f774/65b27a96c510732e02ab776d_Vector.svg)

You can reach our support team anytime from your lemlist account using the chat bubble or via email at [\[email protected\]](https://www.lemlist.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#0d7e787d7d627f794d61686061647e79236e6260). You can also connect with us through the chat bubble on the website.

Please note that if you are not logged into on your account, we will have limited information to assist you.

Advanced personalization, outreach automation, auto email warm-up... Get ready for a cold email outreach tool that makes your life easy.
